dcInactive: Disconnected from voice channel due to inactivity.
clearQueue: The music queue has been cleared.

errors.notInChannel: bring me into a voice channel with {{command}} first!
emptyQueue: there is nothing in the queue!
Use the {{play}} command to queue a song!
errors.tooLong: that song is too long! Queue one shorter than 90 minutes.
errors.alreadyPlaying: there is already a song being played! Queue another song with {{command}}.
errors.notChannel: the current bound text channel is {{channel}}. Please use the music commands there.
errors.notFound: the video you provided could not be found.
errors.listNotFound: the playlist you provided could not be found.
errors.emptyPlaylist: the playlist you provided has no streamable videos.
errors.notInVoice: you need to be in a voice channel!
errors.alreadyBinded: I am already bound to {{text}}! Use commands in that channel.
errors.noPerms: I don't have the permissions to `connect` and/or `speak` in {{voice}}!
errors.error: something bad happened! Please try again later, or submit a bug report.
errors.notInSameVoice: you need to be in the voice channel {{channel}}!
errors.skipNotFound: the video specified could not be found.
errors.notReadyYet: The connection was not ready after 5 tries. Disconnected from voice channel.
errors.connError: A Discord error occurred while streaming to the channel: {{err}}

switch: Switching to streaming mode and playing from {{station}}
votedSkip: you have already voted to skip this song!
voteSkipSuccess: you have voted to skip the current song!
votedClear: you have already voted to clear the queue!
voteClearSuccess: you have voted to clear the current queue!
joinSuccess: Use the {{command}} command to start playing songs!
repeatOn: you have enabled repeat mode. All finished songs will be re-added to the back of the queue.
repeatOff: you have disabled repeat mode. All finished songs will not be re-added.
terminated: The bot is being restarted, all voice connections have been terminated.
The current queue has been saved in the database.
We apologise for any inconvenience caused.
